Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory58.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'How... I was... going after... something...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Ugh... But what was I going after? And why?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "And... what's this place?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'John', 3: "It's our home. Why are you zoning out, Chrome?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'John', 3: 'Call me father. I told you that a long time ago. Have you forgotten?', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Commandant must still be dreaming. He barely ever gets any sleep after all... Commandant, how about we all get a day off?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'A day off? Out of the question—wait, what did you just call me, Kamui?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Commandant. What, you prefer Chrome instead? I don't mind that!", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "No. I'm not a commandant. I'm your leader!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "I'm the leader of Strike Hawk!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "You must still be dreaming. The leader of Strike Hawk is Wanshi. You're our commandant!", 4: '3'}
{3: "Kamui suddenly appears anxious at Chrome's behavior. He begins shouting for help."}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Wanshi! I think Commandant's gone nuts!", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'I hear you! In that case, fix him before you bring him out here!'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "This guy is still slacking off even though he's the leader now! Let's give the guy a good scolding, eh, Commandant?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "I'm not your commandant. And why is my body like this?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Where's my Inver-Device? I should be a Construct.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Uh, Chrome, what exactly happened to you?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'I should be the one asking this question! I should be a Construct! After I failed the commandant exam, I submitted the application to become a Construct...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'John', 3: "But you didn't fail. You passed with flying colors.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Yes. And then you became commandant of the Strike Hawk squad and we defeated countless enemies! We're only a few steps away from recovering Earth!", 4: '1'}
{3: "To help Chrome jog his memory, Chrome's father, Kamui, and all the others who arrive later fill him in on all that's happened."}
{3: 'His father has always been good to him. Chrome became a commandant through his own choice and hard work.'}
{3: 'Right after that, he commanded the Strike Hawk squad to fight against the Corrupted and reclaimed the fallen regions on Earth. It then ended in a battle with the Ascendants.'}
{3: 'In the end, victory was theirs. Everyone is outside waiting for him. The world is out there—a world in which no one has to suffer.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Let's go then, Chrome. Now that you remember, it's time for our final mission.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "True... Can you guys wait outside for me for a bit? I'll get changed and be right here.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Once everyone's gone, the room is back to a blank—except for the door that connects the inside to the outside, the only thing that is clearly outlined."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'You should go that way, Langston.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'What about you, Chrome?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "I'll go this way.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Two similar yet vastly different souls sit together, back to back, seeing entirely different worlds.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "That's a difficult path, Chrome.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'All things are.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'And he goes.'}
